name: SightWords
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sight words
des:
Sight Words provides children with an interactive platform to learn how to read. 

Learning all 1,000 words within the Sight Words list would enable a child to read about 90% of the words in a typical English book, magazine, newspaper, or website.

This skill currently supports grade 1 level reading words but will soon be updated to included grade levels 2 to 9. 

*NOTE: This skill was designed to work best with Alexa devices that support a display (i.e., Echo Spot and Echo Display). However, if you do not have a display enabled device then you can use the Alexa App or Website to view cards.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
